str2: Neuter diminutive of pais; a childling, i.e., an infant, or a half-grown boy or girl; figuratively, an immature Christian.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Last, at the last, finally, till the end. A superlative probably from echo; farthest, final.
Apparently a primary word; an 'hour'.
And, even, also, namely.
According to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as. From kata and hos; just as, that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
From anti and Christos; an opponent of the Messiah.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To come, go.
And, even, also, namely.
A primary particle of present time; 'now'; also as noun or adjective present or immediate.
Much, many; often.
From anti and Christos; an opponent of the Messiah.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
From hos with the directive enclitic of source; from which place or source or cause.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
